name: Drift Night
description:
Get absord by the music and drift your way to victory.

inspired by initial D the game is made of three race try your best to get the best time.

press AD to turn - W to move foward - S to back up - SPACE to drift.

music used are royalty free.

Play it online at : https://gxc.gg/games/otrbjw/drift-night
